set.name: Super Best! Duema Fest Pack: Ten Kings Series Volume 2

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature can't attack unless you have 1 or less cards in your hand. {MAGIBOMBER}(7) (Whenever this creature attacks, look at the top card of your deck. You may put a creature that costs 7 or less from the top of your deck or your hand into the battle zone.)

property.name: Rules
Set
property.value: Super Best! Duema Fest Pack: Ten Kings Series Volume 2

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GALAXYSHIELD} {LW2} (You may pay Light/Water 2 instead of the cost of using this card. If you do, put this card into your shields face up.) ■ At the start of your turn, if this creature is face up in your shields, summon it with its cost paid. {GALAXY GO} ■ At the start of your turn, if this card is face up in your shields, summon it with its cost paid. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose up to 2 of your opponent's creatures. Until the start of your next turn, they can't attack or block.

property.name: Set
property.value: Super Best! Duema Fest Pack: Ten Kings Series Volume 2

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) {Kirifudash} {F3} (At the end of any of your creatures attacks, if that creature breaks a shield while attacking, you may pay Fire 3 to summon this creature.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. This creature and that creature battle.
